column1: '''''lhach''''' is an [[Elvish]] element meaning "leaping flame".<ref name=S>{{S
The word is commonly understood to be a [[Sindarin]] word, taking the [[Neo-Elvish
column2: Neo-Sindarin]] form ''lach''.<ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 19 July 2011)</ref><ref>{{HM
